H0.text: who is credited with developing the geocentric view. Aristotle

H1.text: who is credited with developing the geocentric view. Eratosthenes

H2.text: who is credited with developing the geocentric view. Hipparchus

H3.text: who is credited with developing the geocentric view. Ptolemy

A4.text: Ptolemy's planetary models, like those of the majority of his predecessors, were geocentric and almost universally accepted until the reappearance of heliocentric models during the Scientific Revolution.
